resources.string: This feature requires master key authentication provided to authorized users, i.e. clubs and developers. We are working in making this a common feature.\nBear with us..

While looping through questionsâ€¦search for the keywords of your query. Maybe someone had been as curious as you, earlier. You may find a match. Else, add your query. We\'ll approach it\'s answers ASAP!
For user verification purposes, we will send an OTP via text message to the phone number you\'ll just fill. Enter the phone number below to receive a 6-digit verification code on.
Template image should relate to the challenge being added. Adding no image would result in us, adding your club logo as template image for your challenge.\nClick image to change

team404dev is an aspring team of enterprising individuals with different values and goals but with a shared holy grail : a world better connected than what we now have.

Aspiring minds and hard working individuals are always welcome. We would be more than happy to join hands and work towards a better future.

We wish for a happier world.
